attributes.action: We need to shut down the website 'Ask.FM'
attributes.additional_details: The website ask.fm has recently got a teen boy aged 15 killed because of the Anonymous hate people receive, me being one of them and also some of my other friends. The website is a place for sick minded, wrong in the head people who hide behind anonymous giving people hate over it because they can't say it too there face. Please sign this petition so we can get it shut down once and for all and it will save the life's of our teens and children!
